attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the days go by, there are negative and silly statements coming from Downing st.The latest being "say sorry" to those you hurt.This is now a dysfunctional society.Parliament and the well off can walk, [or fly away from it], normal people have to stay and watch the anarchy unfold.POSITIVE action is required, AND IT IS REQUIRED NOW.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
